# Load data

project_root = get_project_root()

df = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Clean data

df = df.dropna(subset=['Year'])

```{python}
#| fig-height: 9
# Create figure with proper margins

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(14, 9))

# Adjust subplot to prevent cutoff - extra top margin for title

plt.subplots_adjust(left=0.12, right=0.96, top=0.88, bottom=0.15)

# Plot life expectancy

ax.plot(df_plot['Year'], df_plot['US Life expectancy'],
        color=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=5, marker='o', markersize=9)

# Mark 1962 regulation change with vertical line

ax.axvline(x=1962, color=COLOR_BLACK, linestyle='--', linewidth=3, alpha=0.6)

# Add 1962 label

ax.text(1962, 52, '1962\nKefauver-Harris\nAmendment',
        fontsize=28, ha='center', va='bottom', color=COLOR_BLACK,
        bbox=dict(boxstyle='round,pad=0.5', facecolor=COLOR_WHITE,
                  edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=2))

# Add growth rate annotations - Pre-1962

ax.text(1925, 73, 'Pre-1962:\n4 years per decade',
        fontsize=32, ha='center', va='center', color=COLOR_BLACK, weight='bold',
        fontfamily='monospace',
        bbox=dict(boxstyle='round,pad=0.6', facecolor=COLOR_WHITE,
                  edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=2.5))

# Add growth rate annotations - Post-1962

ax.text(1990, 64, 'Post-1962:\n2 years per decade',
        fontsize=32, ha='center', va='center', color=COLOR_BLACK, weight='bold',
        fontfamily='monospace',
        bbox=dict(boxstyle='round,pad=0.6', facecolor=COLOR_WHITE,
                  edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=2.5))

# Add arrow showing the slowdown

from matplotlib.patches import FancyArrowPatch
arrow = FancyArrowPatch((1962, 71), (1990, 64),
                        arrowstyle='->', mutation_scale=30,
                        linewidth=3, color=COLOR_BLACK, alpha=0.6)
ax.add_patch(arrow)

# Title

ax.set_title('Life Expectancy Before and After Efficacy Amendment',
             fontsize=38, weight='bold', pad=25, color=COLOR_BLACK)

# Axis labels

ax.set_xlabel('Year', fontsize=34, weight='bold', color=COLOR_BLACK)
ax.set_ylabel('US Life Expectancy (years)', fontsize=34, weight='bold', color=COLOR_BLACK)

# Tick styling

ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='major', labelsize=28, colors=COLOR_BLACK, width=2, length=8)

# Clean spines

clean_spines(ax, positions=['top', 'right'])
ax.spines['left'].set_linewidth(2)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_linewidth(2)

# No gridlines

ax.grid(False)

# Add watermark

add_watermark(fig)

# Save with proper margins

output_path = get_figure_output_path('life-expectancy-pre-post-1962.png')
plt.savefig(output_path, dpi=200, facecolor=COLOR_WHITE, bbox_inches=None)
plt.show()
```

## Key Finding

From 1890 to 1962, US life expectancy increased at approximately **4 years per year** of calendar time - a remarkably linear growth rate following the adoption of systematic medical research.

After the 1962 Kefauver-Harris Amendment mandated expensive, industry-run efficacy trials, this growth rate was **cut in half** to approximately **2 years per year**.

**The `{python} trial_cost_reduction_pct_formatted` reduction in medical progress coincided precisely with the shift from large-scale real-world evidence trials to small, controlled pharmaceutical company trials.**
